items.sentence: How come you didn't tell me that Tom was going to Australia with us?

If Tom doesn't study harder, he's not likely to pass the final exam.
I can't see how anyone could've accomplished this without some help.
Just when the first human beings will reach Mars remains to be seen.
Tom knew Mary didn't have enough money to buy everything she wanted.
I don't think you need to tell Tom why you went to Boston last week.
I don't think that I need to tell Tom that he needs to study harder.
Tom told me that he came all the way from Boston just to visit Mary.
